header: jpmorgan to buy integrated investment's fund services business
body:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - JPMorgan (JPM.N) said it had agreed to acquire the fund services business of Integrated Investment Services, an affiliate of Western Southern Financial Group.

The U.S. financial group did not disclose the terms of the deal, which is expected to close in the second quarter. (Reporting by Anant Vijay Kala in Bangalore)
